docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations in Gaza is struggling to withstand a flood of almost a quarter of a million refugees into shelters that have repeatedly come under Israeli fire.

headline.main: Under Fire and Out of Cash, U.N. Overwhelmed by Gaza Crisis
headline.print_headline: Under Fire and Out of Cash, U.N. Overwhelmed by Gaza Crisis

docs.lead_paragraph: Mosaicism is more common than once thought and can lead to diseases in the children of those with more than one genome, a study says.

headline.main: Having More Than One Set of DNA Carries Legacy of Risk
headline.print_headline: Parents Can Pass Genes That May Surprise Them

docs.abstract: Research suggests that mosaicism, state in which people carry two or more significantly different genomes, is more common than once thought and can lead to diseases in offspring of mosaic parents.
docs.snippet: Mosaicism is more common than once thought and can lead to diseases in the children of those with more than one genome, a study says.

docs.lead_paragraph: The popular push for locally produced food has spawned flocks of backyard chickens in urban neighborhoods nationwide, but people may not realize that feasting on fresh eggs can mean subjecting their more typical household pets to pain from a new pest that hitches a ride on hens.

headline.main: Chickens Share Backyards and Pests With Dogs, Cats
headline.print_headline: Chickens Share Backyards and Pests With Dogs, Cats

docs.snippet: The popular push for locally produced food has spawned flocks of backyard chickens in urban neighborhoods nationwide, but people may not realize that feasting on fresh eggs can mean subjecting their more typical household pets to pain from a new pest...

docs.lead_paragraph: The idea is intuitively appealing: Reward doctors for positive outcomes, not per procedure. But it doesn't seem to work as well as hoped.

headline.main: The Problem With 'Pay for Performance' in Medicine

docs.snippet: The idea is intuitively appealing: Reward doctors for positive outcomes, not per procedure. But it doesn't seem to work as well as hoped.
